participant_1.background:
I am proud of my ability to stay focused and motivated on my writing, even when it's difficult.
someday i would like a truck.
My mom would have been proud of me for talking my way out of the ticket.
my mom raised me by herself and taught me to play baseball.
I spent my last birthday with my family at our farm, eating a delicious home-cooked meal and playing games.

participant_2.background:
I keep secrets from my parents.
I love my morning coffee and my cozy bed.
i have a lot of trophies from my childhood.
my favorite band is the muggers.
I write stories that transport my readers to another world, where they can escape from the stresses of their everyday lives.

content.text: Hey, not much! Just got done writing a short story.
It's about a group of friends who go on a road trip to find themselves.
That sounds really cool! I'm glad you're passionate about writing.
Thanks! I love writing because it allows me to escape from the stresses of everyday life.
I can definitely relate to that! I love to read books because they can take me to another world.
Me too! I love getting lost in a good book.
It's hard to pick just one, but I'd have to say "The Great Gatsby" by F. Scott Fitzgerald.
That's a great choice! I love that book too.
I'm not sure I could pick just one, but I'd have to say "The Catcher in the Rye" by J.D. Salinger.
That's another great choice! I love that book too.
It's so interesting to see how different people's favorite books can be.
It is! It's always fun to talk to people about their favorite books.
I agree! It's a great way to get to know someone.
